name: DeFiHorse
public_notice:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract - which allows contract owners to .
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
The DeFiHorse is a metaverse e-sport game based on Blockchain technology and NTFs, empowering the players and creators to the next level of the horse race.
It’s not just only a game…but AN UNSTOPPABLE RACE
that you can find nowhere else.
